feature_description: Refactor SIGINT to unified multi-source analysis architecture. Stage 1: Separate ingestion for RSS, Twitter, Polymarket, Tickers storing raw data to S3. Stage 2: New analyzer Lambda loads all sources per category and runs single unified LLM analysis with cross-source boosting. Stage 3: Narrative writer generates explanatory paragraphs with implications. Items should display source tags [RSS] [Twitter] [Polymarket]. Twitter velocity should boost correlated RSS items.
workflow_path: init → analyst → spec_generator → constitution → architect → task_decomposer
